title: [GAMEPLAY] Warlord Shen Champion Mastery animation
body: There's a small issue about Warlord Shen, dont know if this happens with others skins too. You see, there are those banners in his back, so they..."lifted" the HUD, so both can be visible, right ? Problem is, they didnt do the same with the champion mastery animations, so when you press ctrl+6, they animation appears behind the HP bar. It's not a big issue, a minor one i'd say, but it's pretty annoying, specially if you've mastered Shen and want to show off to others. So, maybe pay some attention to this and reply or whatever, and perhaps we'll get Riot to fix it, and Shen wont have to suffer this injustice {{champion:98}} .

replies.body:
Heya! 

This is an issue that occurs with several champions and skins. D: The team is working on a solution to ensure everyone can clearly BM their mastery emotes. ;)
